smooth.metal
Class SmoothBorders

    java.lang.Object
    javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalBorders
    smooth.metal.SmoothBorders

public class SmoothBorders
extends MetalBorders

Border factory. Modelled after the MetalBorders, from which it inherits. The paintBorder() method is overridden to turn on anti-aliasing. This is very similar to what's done in UI delegates.
